(3) CAM Strategy Compass Pillars



CAM Strategy Compass Erik Wilde (@dret): API Strategy Compass Discussion

(4) CAM Strategy Compass Perspectives



CAM Strategy Compass Erik Wilde (@dret): API Strategy Compass Discussion

(5) API Strategy = Pillars × Perspectives

External Internal
Biz
  • API monetization
  • Revenue-supporting APIs
  • Increase speed & feedback
  • Identify & stabilize enablers
  • Design for externalization
  • Increase biz insight with dashboards
Org
  • Focus on documentation/DX
  • Support discovery/self-service
  • Collect DX feedback
  • Products > projects (ownership)
  • Team enablement/support
  • Loose coupling for speed/agility
Tech
  • Tech trends and popularity
  • Invest in onboarding support
  • Secure through platform
  • Loosely coupled implementations
  • Observe patterns and practices
  • Establish C4E for platform/support


CAM Strategy Compass Erik Wilde (@dret): API Strategy Compass Discussion

(6) Strategy Discussions

  • Timeboxed discussion to get acquainted with the topic
    • Why is addressing this important for us?
    • What are things we ideally would like to see?
    • How are we going to realize these goals?
  • SWOT analysis for strategic analysis and planning
    • Strengths: Internal advantages over others
    • Weaknesses: Internal disadvantages relative to others
    • Opportunities: External elements that could be exploited
    • Threats: External elements that could cause trouble


CAM Strategy Compass Erik Wilde (@dret): API Strategy Compass Discussion

(7) SWOT Analysis
